name: NCWidgetListViewDelegate
desc: The interface for handling content display and editing in the list view of a macOS Today widget.DeprecatedUse WidgetKit instead.

items.name: func widgetList(NCWidgetListViewController, viewControllerForRow: Int) -> NSViewController
items.desc: Asks the delegate for a content view controller for the specified row.

items.name: func widgetList(NCWidgetListViewController, didRemoveRow: Int)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the specified row was removed from the list.

items.name: func widgetList(NCWidgetListViewController, shouldRemoveRow: Int) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate to allow or prohibit the specified row to be removed from the list.

items.name: func widgetListPerformAddAction(NCWidgetListViewController)
items.desc: Asks the delegate to perform an action when the Add (+) button is clicked.

items.name: func widgetList(NCWidgetListViewController, didReorderRow: Int, toRow: Int)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the specified row was moved to a new location.

items.name: func widgetList(NCWidgetListViewController, shouldReorderRow: Int) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate to allow or prohibit the specified row to be moved to a new location in the list.
